quotes.quote: Really rejoice in being yourself. Have your own drumbeat.
When we rejoice in beautiful scenery, great art, and great music, it is but the flexing of instincts acquired in another place and another time.
You will be able to check envy if you rejoice with the man whom you envy whenever he rejoices, and grieve whenever he grieves.
To rejoice in life, to find the world beautiful and delightful to live in, was a mark of the Greek spirit, which distinguished it from all that had gone before. It is a vital distinction.
True joy is independence of circumstances - Choose to rejoice!
We have every reason in time and eternity to rejoice and give thanks for the quality of our lives and the blessings we have been given.

Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them, do not. Miss them, do not. Attachment leads to jealousy. The shadow of greed, that is. Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose
Let us rejoice at the many unexplored fields in which there is unlimited fame and fortune to the successful explorer.
To rejoice in conquest is to rejoice in murder.
Let us rejoice in the truth, wherever we find its lamp burning.
It is cheerful to God when you rejoice or laugh from the bottom of your heart.
Christians rejoice even while they truly sorrow - because their rejoicing is in the hope of heaven... While joy overcomes sorrow, it does not put an end to it.
Men of this world all rejoice in others being like themselves, and object to others not being like themselves.
Rejoice and be glad, you have life, the greatest gift.
To rejoice in temporal comforts is dangerous, to rejoice in self is foolish, to rejoice in sin is fatal, but to rejoice in God is heavenly.
You have no obligation under the sun other than to discover your real needs, to fulfill them, and to rejoice in doing so.
When you appreciate the blessings in life, your soul rejoices.
Rejoice as summer should...chase away sorrows by living.
Take spring when it comes and rejoice. Take happiness when it comes and rejoice. Take love when it comes and rejoice.
Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee.
Children have neither past nor future - they rejoice in the present.
Rejoice and be glad all you who hope in the Lord.
To rejoice in life, to find the world beautiful and delightful to live in, was a mark of the Greek spirit which distinguished it from all that had gone before. It is a vital distinction.
Rejoice that you have still have a long time to live, before the thought comes to you that there is nothing more in the world to see.
He who rejoices even at the stake triumphs not over pain but over the absence of pain where he had anticipated feeling it. A parable.
No one rejoices more in revenge than woman.
Rejoice while you have breath.
Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
The proof of a well-trained mind is that it rejoices in which is good and grieves at the opposite.
When you cannot rejoice in feelings, circumstances or conditions, rejoice in the Lord.
